titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for the speedy raising of monies, for compleating and maintaining the army under the immediate command of Robert Earl of Essex, Lord Generall of the forces raised by the Parliament. Assessed in such manner as is within expressed. Ordered by the Commons of Parliament, that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Hen. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
With an order to print on final leaf.
